content: mini merry hexi stocking by lisa s pine notes red heart super saver in mistletoe & size h/5mm hooked used in example shown size j/6mm used in you tube tutorial however both are very flexible perfect scrap yarn buster any size hook can be used you tube lisa s pine notes link https //youtu be/npl5phwayi8 start magic_ring # 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in ring chain 1 3 double_crochet in ring chain 1 5 times slip_stitch to join total 6 double_crochet groups in magic_ring # 2 slip_stitch 3 over into next ch1sp chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet all in first ch1sp chain 1 3 double_crochet 3 chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 all in next ch1sp x5 slip_stitch to join points of 6 have formed you now have a hexagon #3 slip_stitch over 3 into next ch3sp chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet all in first ch3sp chain 1 3 double_crochet in next ch1sp chain 1 * 3 double_crochet 3 chain 3 double_crochet all in next ch3sp chain 1 3 double_crochet in next ch1sp chain 1 repeat from * 4 more times to build sides of stocking slip_stitch to join and slip_stitch over 3 into next ch3sp but do not cut yarn we will now form mini merry hexi stocking shape ©2017 lisa s pine notes 1 mini merry hexi stocking shaping #4 with wrong side facing out fold opposing points together in this case red corner to red corner point will become my heel top is where we left yarn joined leave the top open to add goodies to your mini merry #5 slip_stitch together you will pull the slip stiches on the toe portion where my button is tightly together to form a more rounded shape secure yarn and cut turn to right side shape add yarn to hang up if desired toe options 1 toe work color change opposite the top change colors for toe sock look edge options on page 3 ©2017 lisa s pine notes 2 edge options 1 top edging add a single_crochet top edge in this case white to match toe 2 fancy top edging add a slip_stitch x2 2sc 2hdc 2dc 2hdc 2sc slip_stitch till end on top edge depending how large your stocking is ready to fill hang or give your mini merry hexi stocking please share your mini merry on instagram @lisapinenotes use #ccalongwithlisa thankyou you tube lisa s pine notes
